thread.title: Panthers control ball, hold off Broncos at end
thread.title_full: Panthers control ball, hold off Broncos at end - San Antonio Express-News

author: Mike Considine, For the Express-News
title: Panthers control ball, hold off Broncos at end
text:
It’s hard to score when you don’t have the football.
That was the dilemma Brandeis faced Friday at Farris Stadium. O’Connor limited the Broncos to 14 offensive plays in the first half while compiling a 24-point halftime lead.
The Panthers couldn’t keep the lid on their district rivals during the second half, but they’d done enough to take over first place in District 27-6A Zone B. O’Connor won 45-39.
For more, visit ExpressNews.com
